"Ordinal Tower":
"The Ordinal Tower is a type of Advanced Trainia training facility. In it, you can do battle with various bosses.

The bosses that appear are different for each Rank. Clearing one Rank unlocks the next Rank, where you can fight higher-level bosses."

"The faster your clear time, the higher your Score at the end, and the higher your rewards based on the Rank you have cleared. In addition to powerful weapons, you can obtain support items that let you enhance your gear.

Clear the Tower as quickly as possible, use the rewards to make your equipment stronger, and aim to clear every Rank of the Tower."
